title: Process Subscription Renewal
description: A customer has agreed to renew their annual contract.

tasks.description: Generate a renewal quote for the customer's existing plan.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates the renewal quote in the CRM.

tasks.description: Send the quote to the customer for signature.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends the document via an e-signature tool.

tasks.description: Once signed, process the renewal in the billing system and generate the invoice for the next term.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully renews the contract and issues the new invoice.
